job_description:
Our team is looking for an experienced Software Developer! As an essential contributor to our platform, you will work with enumerable technologies, including Cloud Services, Access Control, and Video Management. Your experience will be vital to our software development process, from analyzing requirements to deployment.

You encompass a creative and dynamic approach to development while facing everyday challenges with an open mind. Your peers know you for your critical thinking, strong work ethic and willingness to learn. You also believe that open communication is vital to success and seek help when needed.

If this sounds like you, we'd love to connect!

IPFusion Perks & Benefits
Retirement Support: We provide every full-time permanent employee with RRSP matching for their long-term plans.
Health & Wellness: Staying healthy is important; we provide health, dental, life, and disability insurance, along with our employee assistance program (EAP).
Development Opportunities: We value your career development by offering professional support, training reimbursement programs, Lunch n' Learns, etc.
Social: We enjoy getting together at our company golf tournament, Christmas parties, summer BBQs, etc.
Culture: Join our innovative, collaborative, and energetic environment.
Flexibility: We try to accommodate real life as much as possible and know that work is only a part of our daily lives.
Office: Plenty to do besides work with a gym and golf simulator. We are within walking distance of a golf course, too!

Responsibilities:
Work closely with a team of talented individuals to develop the best experience for our user base.
Create and enhance features in our core products.
Investigate and diagnose issues as they occur in live environments.
Assist with architecture and design.
Support the professional development of our junior team members through coaching and mentoring.
Ensure coding standards and code quality through code reviews.
Enable continuous improvement across the SDLC by introducing new technologies and processes.
Create and review technical product documentation.
Stay current with our platform and business goals.

Requirements:
Bachelor's degree or diploma in engineering, computer science, information technology, or equivalent experience.
Minimum 3 years of professional experience.
C# experience.
Experience with HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React.
ASP.NET Core experience.
Experience with one or more database systems such as MySQL, Cosmos DB, etc.
Familiarity with debugging and the ability to diagnose issues.
Familiar with unit testing principals and practical application.

Nice to Have:
Experience with Kubernetes and Containerization.
Azure IoT or equivalent.
Familiar with BACnet, Serial, and other communication interfaces.
Familiarity with Linux Systems.
Experience in the field of Cyber and Data Security.
Basic DevOps knowledge.

About Us:

IPFusion is a leader in bringing operational efficiency to the building management and physical security space. Our platform focuses on integrating best-in-class security and safety systems, including Video Management, Access Control, and Alarming. With real-time alerting, we empower security response personnel and building operators to respond quickly with the right decisions.

Please find out more about us at www.ipfusion.ca

COVID-19 considerations:

All employees are required to provide proof of double COVID-19 vaccination or negative COVID-19 tests weekly.

IPFusion is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Please get in touch with us if you need assistance or an accommodation with your application.
